description: Blockbench is an open-source app for creating 3D models, texturing them, and animating them. You can also install plugins to the program to extend its capabilities.
For example, you can install plugins by selecting File â†’ Plugins . If you install the Preview Scene Customizer plugin, you can create, edit, manage, export, and download BBSCENE preview scenes.
